name: Super Time Arrest: Medieval Scuffle
description:
SUPER TIME ARREST: MEDIEVAL SCUFFLE, is a FPS set in Western European Medieval Melbourne, Australia, where your goal is to defeat the Fully Evil Castle Knights and save the city!

Made as part of my student work for AIE, everything in this game is done by me.

This game is pretty basic, with only two levels, but I do eventually want to keep working on this, so if there's any demand I'll probably keep adding to it.
